1: הַדָּבָ֗ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>The word</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> דִּבֶּ֧ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>concerning</n> בָּבֶ֖ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>against Babylon</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>concerning</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[and] against the land</n> כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <sup>3778 </sup> <n>of the Chaldeans</n> בְּיַ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by</n> יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <sup>3414 </sup> <n>Jeremiah</n> הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <sup>5030 </sup> <n>the prophet</n>
2: הַגִּ֨ידוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>Declare</n> בַגּוֹיִ֤ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>ye among the nations</n> וְהַשְׁמִ֙יעוּ֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and publish</n> וּֽשְׂאוּ־ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and set up</n> נֵ֔ס <sup>5251 </sup> <n>a standard</n> הַשְׁמִ֖יעוּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>publish</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תְּכַחֵ֑דוּ <sup>3582 </sup> <n>[and] conceal</n> אִמְרוּ֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>not say</n> נִלְכְּדָ֨ה <sup>3920 </sup> <n>is taken</n> בָבֶ֜ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>Babylon</n> הֹבִ֥ישׁ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>is confounded</n> בֵּל֙ <sup>1078 </sup> <n>Bel</n> חַ֣ת <sup>2865 </sup> <n>is broken in pieces</n> מְרֹדָ֔ךְ <sup>4781 </sup> <n>Merodach</n> הֹבִ֣ישׁוּ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>are confounded</n> עֲצַבֶּ֔יהָ <sup>6091 </sup> <n>her idols</n> חַ֖תּוּ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>are broken in pieces</n> גִּלּוּלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>1544 </sup> <n>her images</n>
3: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עָלָה֩ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>there cometh up</n> עָלֶ֨יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> גּ֜וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>a nation</n> מִצָּפ֗וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>For out of the north</n> הֽוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>it</n> יָשִׁ֤ית <sup>7896 </sup> <n>against her which shall make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצָהּ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>her land</n> לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <sup>8047 </sup> <n>desolate</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will be no</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and none shall dwell</n> בָּ֑הּ מֵאָדָ֥ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>both man</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּהֵמָ֖ה <sup>929 </sup> <n>and beast</n> נָ֥דוּ <sup>5110 </sup> <n>therein they shall remove</n> הָלָֽכוּ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>they shall depart</n>
4: בַּיָּמִ֨ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In those days</n> הָהֵ֜מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>those</n> וּבָעֵ֤ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>and in that time</n> הַהִיא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> יָבֹ֧אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הֵ֥מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>those</n> וּבְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>they and the children</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> יַחְדָּ֑ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> הָל֤וֹךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>going</n> וּבָכוֹ֙ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and weeping</n> יֵלֵ֔כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>go</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n> יְבַקֵּֽשׁוּ׃ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>and seek</n>
5: צִיּ֣וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>to Zion</n> יִשְׁאָ֔לוּ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>They shall ask</n> דֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>the way</n> הֵ֣נָּה <sup>2008 </sup> <n>thitherward</n> פְנֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>with their faces</n> בֹּ֚אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>[saying] Come</n> וְנִלְו֣וּ <sup>3867 </sup> <n>and let us join</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>ourselves to the LORD</n> בְּרִ֥ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>covenant</n> עוֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>in a perpetual</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִשָּׁכֵֽחַ׃ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>[that] shall not be forgotten</n> ס
6: צֹ֤אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>sheep</n> אֹֽבְדוֹת֙ <sup>6 </sup> <n>hath been lost</n> [הָיָה כ] (הָי֣וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ק) עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>My people</n> רֹעֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>7462 </sup> <n>their shepherds</n> הִתְע֔וּם <sup>8582 </sup> <n>have caused them to go astray</n> הָרִ֖ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>[on] the mountains</n> [שֹׁובֵבִים כ] (שֹֽׁובְב֑וּם <sup>7726 </sup> <n>backsliding</n> ק) מֵהַ֤ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>from mountain</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> גִּבְעָה֙ <sup>1389 </sup> <n>to hill</n> הָלָ֔כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>they have gone</n> שָׁכְח֖וּ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>they have forgotten</n> רִבְצָֽם׃ <sup>7258 </sup> <n>their restingplace</n>
7: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> מוֹצְאֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>4672 </sup> <n>All that found</n> אֲכָל֔וּם <sup>398 </sup> <n>them have devoured</n> וְצָרֵיהֶ֥ם <sup>6862 </sup> <n>them and their adversaries</n> אָמְר֖וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> נֶאְשָׁ֑ם <sup>816 </sup> <n>We offend</n> תַּ֗חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>as they</n> חָטְא֤וּ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>not because they have sinned</n> לַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>against the LORD</n> נְוֵה־ <sup>5116 </sup> <n>the habitation</n> צֶ֔דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>of justice</n> וּמִקְוֵ֥ה <sup>4723 </sup> <n>the hope</n> אֲבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their fathers</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>even the LORD</n> ס

9: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> אָנֹכִ֡י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מֵעִיר֩ <sup>5782 </sup> <n>For lo I will raise</n> וּמַעֲלֶ֨ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and cause to come up</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בָּבֶ֜ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>against Babylon</n> קְהַל־ <sup>6951 </sup> <n>an assembly</n> גּוֹיִ֤ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> גְּדֹלִים֙ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>of great</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>country</n> צָפ֔וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>from the north</n> וְעָ֣רְכוּ <sup>6186 </sup> <n>and they shall set themselves in array</n> לָ֔הּ מִשָּׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> תִּלָּכֵ֑ד <sup>3920 </sup> <n>against her from thence she shall be taken</n> חִצָּיו֙ <sup>2671 </sup> <n>their arrows</n> כְּגִבּ֣וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>[shall be] as of a mighty</n> מַשְׁכִּ֔יל <sup>7919 </sup> <n>an expert</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָשׁ֖וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>none shall return</n> רֵיקָֽם׃ <sup>7387 </sup> <n>in vain</n>

11: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> [תִשְׂמְחִי כ] (תִשְׂמְחוּ֙ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>cheer up</n> ק) כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> [תַעֲלְזִי כ] (תַֽעַלְז֔וּ <sup>5937 </sup> <n>be joyful</n> ק) שֹׁסֵ֖י <sup>8154 </sup> <n>O ye destroyers</n> נַחֲלָתִ֑י <sup>5159 </sup> <n>of mine heritage</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> [תָפוּשִׁי כ] (תָפ֙וּשׁוּ֙ <sup>6335 </sup> <n>grow up</n> ק) כְּעֶגְלָ֣ה <sup>5697 </sup> <n>as the heifer</n> דָשָׁ֔ה <sup>1877 </sup> <n>grass</n> [וְתִצְהֲלִי כ] (וְתִצְהֲל֖וּ <sup>6670 </sup> <n>bellow</n> ק) כָּאֲבִּרִֽים׃ <sup>47 </sup> <n>as bulls</n>
12: בּ֤וֹשָׁה <sup>954 </sup> <n>confounded</n> אִמְּכֶם֙ <sup>517 </sup> <n>Your mother</n> מְאֹ֔ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>shall be sore</n> חָפְרָ֖ה <sup>2659 </sup> <n>you shall be ashamed</n> יֽוֹלַדְתְּכֶ֑ם <sup>3205 </sup> <n>she that bare</n> הִנֵּה֙ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אַחֲרִ֣ית <sup>319 </sup> <n>behold the hindermost</n> גּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the nations</n> מִדְבָּ֖ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>[shall be] a wilderness</n> צִיָּ֥ה <sup>6723 </sup> <n>a dry land</n> וַעֲרָבָֽה׃ <sup>6160 </sup> <n>and a desert</n>
13: מִקֶּ֤צֶף <sup>7110 </sup> <n>Because of the wrath</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵשֵׁ֔ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>it shall not be inhabited</n> וְהָיְתָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שְׁמָמָ֖ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>but it shall be wholly desolate</n> כֻּלָּ֑הּ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>will be completely</n> כֹּ֚ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Everyone</n> עֹבֵ֣ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>every one that goeth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> בָּבֶ֔ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>by Babylon</n> יִשֹּׁ֥ם <sup>8074 </sup> <n>shall be astonished</n> וְיִשְׁרֹ֖ק <sup>8319 </sup> <n>and hiss</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> מַכּוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>4347 </sup> <n>at all her plagues</n>

32: וְכָשַׁ֤ל <sup>3782 </sup> <n>shall stumble</n> זָדוֹן֙ <sup>2087 </sup> <n>And the most proud</n> וְנָפַ֔ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and fall</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> ל֖וֹ מֵקִ֑ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and none shall raise him up</n> וְהִצַּ֤תִּי <sup>3341 </sup> <n>and I will kindle</n> אֵשׁ֙ <sup>784 </sup> <n>a fire</n> בְּעָרָ֔יו <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in his cities</n> וְאָכְלָ֖ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>and it shall devour</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> סְבִיבֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>5439 </sup> <n>all round about</n> ס
33: כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָא֔וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> עֲשׁוּקִ֛ים <sup>6231 </sup> <n>[were] oppressed</n> בְּנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>The children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וּבְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the children</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> יַחְדָּ֑ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> שֹֽׁבֵיהֶם֙ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>and all that took them captives</n> הֶחֱזִ֣יקוּ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>held them fast</n> בָ֔ם מֵאֲנ֖וּ <sup>3985 </sup> <n>they refused</n> שַׁלְּחָֽם׃ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>to let them go</n>
34: גֹּאֲלָ֣ם ׀ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>Their Redeemer</n> חָזָ֗ק <sup>2389 </sup> <n>[is] strong</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָאוֹת֙ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> שְׁמ֔וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[is] his name</n> רִ֥יב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>he shall throughly</n> יָרִ֖יב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>plead</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רִיבָ֑ם <sup>7379 </sup> <n>their cause</n> לְמַ֙עַן֙ <sup>4616 </sup> <n>So</n> הִרְגִּ֣יעַ <sup>7280 </sup> <n>that he may give rest</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>to the land</n> וְהִרְגִּ֖יז <sup>7264 </sup> <n>and disquiet</n> לְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>the inhabitants</n> בָבֶֽל׃ <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n>
35: חֶ֥רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>A sword</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <sup>3778 </sup> <n>[is] upon the Chaldeans</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and against</n> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and upon the inhabitants</n> בָבֶ֔ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and against</n> שָׂרֶ֖יהָ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and upon her princes</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and against</n> חֲכָמֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>2450 </sup> <n>and upon her wise</n>
36: חֶ֥רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>A sword</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> הַבַּדִּ֖ים <sup>907 </sup> <n>[is] upon the liars</n> וְנֹאָ֑לוּ <sup>2973 </sup> <n>and they shall dote</n> חֶ֥רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>a sword</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> גִּבּוֹרֶ֖יהָ <sup>1368 </sup> <n>[is] upon her mighty men</n> וָחָֽתּוּ׃ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>and they shall be dismayed</n>
37: חֶ֜רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>A sword</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> סוּסָ֣יו <sup>5483 </sup> <n>[is] upon their horses</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and against</n> רִכְבּ֗וֹ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>and upon their chariots</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and against</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעֶ֛רֶב <sup>6154 </sup> <n>the foreigners</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בְּתוֹכָ֖הּ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>that [are] in the midst</n> וְהָי֣וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> לְנָשִׁ֑ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>of her and they shall become as women</n> חֶ֥רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>a sword</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> אוֹצְרֹתֶ֖יהָ <sup>214 </sup> <n>[is] upon her treasures</n> וּבֻזָּֽזוּ׃ <sup>962 </sup> <n>and they shall be robbed</n>
38: חֹ֥רֶב <sup>2721 </sup> <n>A drought</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> מֵימֶ֖יהָ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>[is] upon her waters</n> וְיָבֵ֑שׁוּ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>and they shall be dried up</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>is a</n> אֶ֤רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>for it [is] the land</n> פְּסִלִים֙ <sup>6456 </sup> <n>of graven images</n> הִ֔יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וּבָאֵימִ֖ים <sup>367 </sup> <n>upon [their] idols</n> יִתְהֹלָֽלוּ׃ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>and they are mad</n>
39: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> יֵשְׁב֤וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>shall dwell</n> צִיִּים֙ <sup>6728 </sup> <n>Therefore the wild beasts of the desert</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>along</n> אִיִּ֔ים <sup>338 </sup> <n>with the wild beasts of the islands</n> וְיָ֥שְׁבוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>shall dwell</n> בָ֖הּ בְּנ֣וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>first</n> יַֽעֲנָ֑ה <sup>3284 </sup> <n>the ostriches</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will never</n> תֵשֵׁ֥ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>therein and it shall be no more inhabited</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> לָנֶ֔צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>for ever</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will never</n> תִשְׁכּ֖וֹן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>neither shall it be dwelt</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>from</n> דּ֥וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>in from generation</n> וָדֽוֹר׃ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>to generation</n>
40: כְּמַהְפֵּכַ֨ת <sup>4114 </sup> <n>overthrew</n> אֱלֹהִ֜ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>As God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> סְדֹ֧ם <sup>5467 </sup> <n>Sodom</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲמֹרָ֛ה <sup>6017 </sup> <n>and Gomorrah</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁכֵנֶ֖יהָ <sup>7934 </sup> <n>and the neighbour</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>[cities] thereof saith</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> יֵשֵׁ֥ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>abide</n> שָׁם֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>[so] shall no man</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יָג֥וּר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>dwell</n> בָּ֖הּ בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>there neither shall any son</n> אָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n>
41: הִנֵּ֛ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> עַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>Behold a people</n> בָּ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> מִצָּפ֑וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>from the north</n> וְג֤וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nation</n> גָּדוֹל֙ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and a great</n> וּמְלָכִ֣ים <sup>4428 </sup> <n>kings</n> רַבִּ֔ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and many</n> יֵעֹ֖רוּ <sup>5782 </sup> <n>shall be raised up</n> מִיַּרְכְּתֵי־ <sup>3411 </sup> <n>from the coasts</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
42: קֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>the bow</n> וְכִידֹ֞ן <sup>3591 </sup> <n>and the lance</n> יַחֲזִ֗יקוּ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>They shall hold</n> אַכְזָרִ֥י <sup>394 </sup> <n>they [are] cruel</n> הֵ֙מָּה֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יְרַחֵ֔מוּ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>and will not shew mercy</n> קוֹלָם֙ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>their voice</n> כַּיָּ֣ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>like the sea</n> יֶהֱמֶ֔ה <sup>1993 </sup> <n>shall roar</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Against</n> סוּסִ֖ים <sup>5483 </sup> <n>upon horses</n> יִרְכָּ֑בוּ <sup>7392 </sup> <n>and they shall ride</n> עָר֗וּךְ <sup>6186 </sup> <n>[every one] put in array</n> כְּאִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>like a man</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to the battle</n> עָלַ֖יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Against</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>against thee O daughter</n> בָּבֶֽל׃ <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n>
43: שָׁמַ֧ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hath heard</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>The king</n> בָּבֶ֛ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שִׁמְעָ֖ם <sup>8088 </sup> <n>the report</n> וְרָפ֣וּ <sup>7503 </sup> <n>waxed feeble</n> יָדָ֑יו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of them and his hands</n> צָרָה֙ <sup>6869 </sup> <n>anguish</n> הֶחֱזִיקַ֔תְהוּ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>took hold</n> חִ֖יל <sup>2427 </sup> <n>of him [and] pangs</n> כַּיּוֹלֵדָֽה׃ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>as of a woman in travail</n>
44: הִ֠נֵּה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> כְּאַרְיֵ֞ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>like a lion</n> יַעֲלֶ֨ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Behold he shall come up</n> מִגְּא֣וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>from the swelling</n> הַיַּרְדֵּן֮ <sup>3383 </sup> <n>of Jordan</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> נְוֵ֣ה <sup>5116 </sup> <n>unto the habitation</n> אֵיתָן֒ <sup>386 </sup> <n>of the strong</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>in</n> אַרְגִּ֤עָה <sup>7280 </sup> <n>them suddenly</n> [אֲרוּצֵם כ] (אֲרִיצֵם֙ <sup>7323 </sup> <n>break down</n> ק) מֵֽעָלֶ֔יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וּמִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>and whoever</n> בָח֖וּר <sup>970 </sup> <n>young</n> אֵלֶ֣יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> אֶפְקֹ֑ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>[man that] I may appoint</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> מִ֤י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> כָמ֙וֹנִי֙ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>is like</n> וּמִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>and who</n> יוֹעִדֶ֔נִּי <sup>3259 </sup> <n>over her? for who [is] like me? and who will appoint me the time</n> וּמִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>and who</n> זֶ֣ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>then</n> רֹעֶ֔ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>? and who [is] that shepherd</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יַעֲמֹ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>that will stand</n> לְפָנָֽי׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n>
45: לָכֵ֞ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> שִׁמְע֣וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Therefore hear</n> עֲצַת־ <sup>6098 </sup> <n>ye the counsel</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יָעַץ֙ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>that he hath taken</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> בָּבֶ֔ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>against Babylon</n> וּמַ֨חְשְׁבוֹתָ֔יו <sup>4284 </sup> <n>and his purposes</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> חָשַׁ֖ב <sup>2803 </sup> <n>that he hath purposed</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>against the land</n> כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <sup>3778 </sup> <n>of the Chaldeans</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִסְחָבוּם֙ <sup>5498 </sup> <n>shall draw them out</n> צְעִירֵ֣י <sup>6810 </sup> <n>Surely the least</n> הַצֹּ֔אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>of the flock</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יַשִּׁ֛ים <sup>8074 </sup> <n>desolate</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> נָוֶֽה׃ <sup>5116 </sup> <n>surely he shall make [their] habitation</n>
46: מִקּוֹל֙ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>At the noise</n> נִתְפְּשָׂ֣ה <sup>8610 </sup> <n>of the taking</n> בָבֶ֔ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> נִרְעֲשָׁ֖ה <sup>7493 </sup> <n>is moved</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> וּזְעָקָ֖ה <sup>2201 </sup> <n>and the cry</n> בַּגּוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the nations</n> נִשְׁמָֽע׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>is heard</n> ס
